name: Mammut 3mm Nylon Static Cord
description:
This 3mm cord should be used for non-climbing functions only. Great for anything from lanyards to clotheslines.Tensile strength 180kg.Sold by the metre.

        Sustainability






.bluesign-cls-1,.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{fill:none;}.bluesign-cls-2,.bluesign-cls-3{stroke:#333;stroke-width:1.79px;}.bluesign-cls-2{stroke-linejoin:round;}.bluesign-cls-3{stroke-miterlimit:10;}
